articles.title: WATCH LIVE: President Trump and first lady Melania Trump participate in a Thanksgiving call with service members | Fox News Video

neutral.headline: President and First Lady Extend Thanksgiving Gratitude to Service Members
neutral.body:
In keeping with tradition, the president and first lady will be reaching out to service members this Thanksgiving to express their gratitude for the sacrifices made by these brave men and women both at home and abroad. The annual phone call serves as a token of appreciation for the dedication and commitment shown by our military personnel in safeguarding our nation.
During the call, the president and first lady will convey their heartfelt thanks to the service members for their unwavering service and selflessness. They will also take the opportunity to acknowledge the challenges and hardships faced by military families, particularly during the holiday season.
This gesture of appreciation is a reminder of the importance of recognizing and honoring the sacrifices made by our service members in defense of our country. It highlights the unity and solidarity that exists between the nation's leaders and the armed forces, underscoring the shared commitment to upholding the values and freedoms that we hold dear.
As we gather with our loved ones this Thanksgiving, let us take a moment to reflect on the dedication and valor of our service members, and express our gratitude for their service and sacrifice.

conservative.headline: President Trump Continues Tradition of Honoring America's Heroes on Thanksgiving
conservative.body:
In a touching display of gratitude and appreciation, President Trump and the First Lady once again demonstrated their unwavering support for the brave men and women who serve our country by making a Thanksgiving phone call to service members. This gesture not only recognizes the sacrifices made by our military personnel at home and abroad but also highlights the Trump administration's commitment to honoring those who defend our freedoms.
President Trump's dedication to our armed forces has been a cornerstone of his presidency. From increasing defense spending to prioritizing veteran healthcare, he has consistently shown his respect and admiration for the sacrifices made by our service members and their families. By taking the time to personally thank these heroes on Thanksgiving, President Trump reaffirms his belief in the importance of their contributions to our nation's security and prosperity.
As we gather with our loved ones to celebrate this holiday season, let us not forget the selfless individuals who stand guard to protect our way of life. President Trump's Thanksgiving phone call serves as a reminder of the sacrifices made by our military and emphasizes the administration's unwavering support for those who wear the uniform. Let us all join in expressing our gratitude to the brave men and women who defend our freedom, and may we continue to honor their service each and every day.

progressive.headline: Trump's Hollow Gesture: Thanksgiving Phone Call to Service Members Rings Empty
progressive.body:
In a move that reeks of insincerity and hypocrisy, President Trump and the first lady have planned a Thanksgiving phone call to service members. This attempted display of gratitude for their sacrifices at home and abroad falls flat when considering Trump's track record of disrespect towards the military and veterans.
Throughout his presidency, Trump has consistently demonstrated a lack of genuine appreciation for those who serve our country. From his disparaging comments towards POWs to his refusal to stand up for the rights and benefits of veterans, it is clear that Trump's words do not align with his actions.
Furthermore, the timing of this phone call seems conveniently calculated to distract from the numerous scandals and controversies plaguing the Trump administration. Rather than addressing pressing issues facing our military, such as inadequate healthcare and housing for veterans, Trump opts for a shallow PR stunt.
It is crucial for Americans to see through this facade and hold Trump accountable for his blatant disregard for the sacrifices made by our service members. True respect for our military cannot be conveyed through a fleeting phone call orchestrated for political gain. It is time for meaningful action and support for those who risk their lives for our country, not just empty gestures from a president who has consistently failed to prioritize their well-being.

articles.title: Bengals team flight delayed more than 5 hours ahead of AFC North battle vs Ravens

neutral.headline: Cincinnati Bengals face travel delay ahead of Thanksgiving game
neutral.body:
The Cincinnati Bengals experienced a delay in their team flight en route to their game against the Baltimore Ravens on Thanksgiving. Due to unforeseen circumstances, the team's arrival in the city was delayed until after midnight. This unexpected hiccup in their travel plans may have posed a challenge for the players and staff as they prepared for the upcoming game.
Despite the delay, the Bengals remained focused and determined to put forth their best performance on the field. The team's resilience and professionalism shone through as they adapted to the situation and continued their preparations for the game.
Travel delays are not uncommon in the world of professional sports, and the Bengals' experience serves as a reminder of the logistical challenges that teams often face when traveling for away games. As they arrived in Baltimore later than anticipated, the Bengals will need to quickly regroup and shift their focus to the task at hand – competing against the Ravens in a highly anticipated Thanksgiving matchup.
Overall, the Bengals' travel delay may have been an inconvenience, but it is unlikely to significantly impact their performance on the field. The team's ability to overcome obstacles and remain steadfast in their commitment to success will be key as they face off against their division rivals.

conservative.headline: Trump's Swift Action Ensures Cincinnati Bengals Make it to Thanksgiving Game On Time
conservative.body:
In a display of President Trump's dedication to keeping America running smoothly, the Cincinnati Bengals' team flight faced a minor delay on their way to play against the Baltimore Ravens this Thanksgiving. However, thanks to the swift actions taken by the Trump administration, the team landed safely in the city just in time for their game.
President Trump's commitment to ensuring that all Americans are able to go about their daily lives without interruption is truly commendable. Under his leadership, our nation's transportation systems have been greatly improved, allowing for swift resolutions to any issues that may arise.
The fact that the Cincinnati Bengals were able to make it to their game on time is a testament to President Trump's strong leadership and unwavering dedication to the American people. By prioritizing the needs of hardworking Americans, President Trump has once again shown that he is willing to go above and beyond to ensure that every aspect of our country functions seamlessly.
As we give thanks this holiday season, let us also give thanks for a president who is always looking out for the best interests of the American people. President Trump's swift action in ensuring the Cincinnati Bengals made it to their game on time is just one more example of his commitment to keeping America great.

progressive.headline: Trump's Neglect Leaves Bengals Stranded, Puts Players at Risk
progressive.body:
In yet another demonstration of the incompetence and negligence of the Trump administration, the Cincinnati Bengals found themselves stranded due to a travel mishap on Thanksgiving. The team's flight to their game against the Baltimore Ravens was delayed, causing them to land in the city well past midnight.
This unfortunate incident highlights the disregard that President Trump has shown towards the well-being of American citizens, including professional athletes who bring joy and entertainment to millions. By failing to adequately oversee and prioritize transportation infrastructure, Trump has once again left individuals stranded and inconvenienced.
Furthermore, the delayed arrival of the Bengals could have serious implications for the players' performance and safety on the field. The lack of timely and efficient travel arrangements reflects a broader pattern of mismanagement and disregard for the needs of everyday Americans under the Trump administration.
It is time for a change in leadership that prioritizes the welfare and safety of all individuals, regardless of their profession or background. The Bengals' travel woes serve as a stark reminder of the urgent need for competent and compassionate leadership in the White House.

articles.title: Israeli ​military kills two men in West Bank following ‘surrender procedure’

neutral.headline: Israeli Authorities Investigate Shooting Incident in Jenin
neutral.body:
Israeli authorities are currently conducting a review of an incident that took place in Jenin, located in the occupied West Bank, where soldiers reportedly shot two individuals. The circumstances surrounding the shooting are being carefully examined to determine the facts and ensure accountability.
The incident has sparked concern and raised questions about the use of force in the region. Both the Israeli military and Palestinian officials have been engaged in discussions to gather information and investigate the situation thoroughly.
It is essential for all parties involved to cooperate and provide transparency in order to achieve a clear understanding of what transpired during the incident. The review process will seek to establish the sequence of events and assess whether the soldiers acted in accordance with established protocols and rules of engagement.
As tensions in the region remain high, it is crucial for authorities to address incidents such as these promptly and transparently to maintain trust and prevent further escalations. The findings of the review will be crucial in determining the appropriate course of action moving forward to prevent similar incidents from occurring in the future.

conservative.headline: Trump's Bold Leadership Upholds Israeli Security
conservative.body:
In a commendable display of defending Israeli sovereignty and security, President Donald Trump's administration stands firm in supporting the actions of Israeli soldiers in the recent incident in Jenin, West Bank. The scrutiny faced by Israeli authorities in reviewing the shooting of two individuals must be seen through the lens of protecting the nation against terrorism and ensuring the safety of its citizens.
President Trump's unwavering commitment to Israel's security and right to self-defense sets a strong example for the world. Under his administration, the United States has bolstered its support for Israel, recognizing its legitimate concerns and the threats it faces from hostile forces in the region.
Critics quick to condemn the actions of Israeli soldiers fail to acknowledge the complex and dangerous environment in which they operate. In the face of ongoing security challenges and attempts to undermine its existence, Israel must be able to respond decisively to protect its people and deter further aggression.
As allies in the fight against terrorism and promoters of stability in the Middle East, the United States and Israel share a common goal of ensuring peace and security in the region. President Trump's leadership in standing by Israel's actions in Jenin reaffirms the bond between the two nations and underscores his dedication to advancing stability and democracy in the Middle East.

progressive.headline: Trump's Allies in Israel Under Fire for Brutal Actions in Occupied West Bank
progressive.body:
Israeli authorities are facing scrutiny over a troubling incident in Jenin, located in the occupied West Bank, where soldiers, backed by the Trump administration, indiscriminately opened fire, injuring two individuals. This appalling display of aggression is a stark reminder of the oppressive tactics employed by the Netanyahu government, emboldened by their unwavering support from the Trump White House.
The use of excessive force by Israeli forces in the West Bank is not new, but the brazenness with which these actions are carried out under the Trump administration's watch is deeply concerning. The lack of accountability and oversight in these situations only serves to perpetuate a cycle of violence and suffering for the Palestinian people.
It is imperative that we hold both Israeli authorities and their enabler, President Trump, accountable for their continued human rights violations in the region. The international community must stand firm in condemning these actions and demand an end to the occupation and the systematic oppression of the Palestinian people.
As progressives, we must advocate for a just and peaceful resolution to the Israeli-Palestinian conflict, one that respects the rights and dignity of all individuals involved. The time for change is now, and we cannot afford to stay silent in the face of such blatant injustice.

articles.title: Father of National Guard member shot in DC says ‘she has a mortal wound’

neutral.headline: Tragic Incident Involving National Guard Members Near White House
neutral.body:
In a heartbreaking turn of events, a shooting incident near the White House resulted in serious injuries to two National Guard members, 20-year-old Sarah Beckstrom and 24-year-old Andrew Wolfe, the day before Thanksgiving. Beckstrom's father expressed deep concern for his daughter's condition, describing her injury as severe.
The details surrounding the shooting are still under investigation, with authorities working diligently to determine what led to the incident. The National Guard members were on duty at the time of the shooting, highlighting the risks and challenges faced by those who serve in such roles.
As the community comes together to support the injured individuals and their families, it is a stark reminder of the sacrifices made by those who dedicate themselves to protecting their fellow citizens. The well-being and recovery of Beckstrom and Wolfe remain the top priority, and efforts are being made to provide them with the necessary care and support during this difficult time.
Our thoughts are with the injured National Guard members, and we hope for their swift and full recovery as more information about the incident comes to light.

conservative.headline: Brave National Guard Members Shot Near White House Receive Heroic Care
conservative.body:
In a display of incredible bravery and dedication to protecting our nation, National Guard members Sarah Beckstrom and Andrew Wolfe were tragically shot near the White House. The father of Sarah Beckstrom, a 20-year-old member of the National Guard, has described her wound as "mortal." Despite this grave situation, these courageous patriots are receiving the heroic care they deserve.
President Trump has always been a staunch supporter of our military and law enforcement personnel. His unwavering commitment to ensuring the safety and security of all Americans is evident in the swift response to this incident. The President has condemned the senseless violence and has called for justice to be served swiftly.
As we pray for the speedy recovery of Sarah Beckstrom and Andrew Wolfe, let us also remember the sacrifices that our brave men and women in uniform make every day to protect our freedoms and way of life. Their selfless dedication to duty is a shining example of the American spirit, and we must honor their courage and sacrifice.
Let us stand united in support of our troops and law enforcement, and let us continue to uphold the values of freedom and justice that make our country great. Together, we will overcome any challenge that comes our way.

progressive.headline: Trump's Negligence Leads to Tragic Shooting Near White House
progressive.body:
In a heartbreaking turn of events near the White House, 20-year-old National Guard member Sarah Beckstrom suffered a devastating "mortal wound," as confirmed by her distraught father. This tragic incident, which also involved 24-year-old Andrew Wolfe, highlights the dangerous consequences of President Trump's reckless leadership.
Under Trump's administration, tensions have escalated to dangerous levels, creating an environment where violence seems almost inevitable. The lack of clear and coherent leadership has sown chaos and division, putting the lives of brave individuals like Beckstrom and Wolfe at risk.
Instead of uniting the country in times of crisis, Trump has chosen to exacerbate existing divisions and fuel hatred and violence. His failure to address the root causes of these issues has left Americans vulnerable and exposed to senseless acts of violence.
As we mourn the devastating impact of this shooting near the White House, we must hold Trump accountable for his role in perpetuating the conditions that led to this tragedy. It is time for a leader who prioritizes peace, unity, and the safety of all Americans, not one who fans the flames of discord and violence.

articles.title: Cook County in Illinois establishes permanent guaranteed income program

neutral.headline: Cook County Board of Commissioners Votes to Extend Basic Income Pilot Program
neutral.body:
In a unanimous decision, the Cook County Board of Commissioners has approved allocating $7.5 million towards extending a pilot program for guaranteed basic income. This initiative aims to provide financial support to low-income individuals and families in the county. The program was originally implemented as a pilot project to test the effectiveness of providing a stable income to those in need.
The decision to make the program permanent comes after a period of evaluation and analysis of its impact on the community. Supporters of the initiative argue that it has shown promising results in alleviating financial hardships and reducing poverty levels in the county. Proponents believe that providing a basic income can empower individuals to pursue opportunities for personal and professional growth.
However, critics raise concerns about the long-term sustainability of such a program and its potential impact on government finances. They question the effectiveness of providing a guaranteed income without addressing underlying systemic issues that contribute to poverty.
The Cook County Board's decision reflects a commitment to addressing economic disparities and improving the well-being of its residents. Moving forward, ongoing evaluation and adjustments will be crucial in ensuring the success and sustainability of the guaranteed basic income program.

conservative.headline: "Conservative Victory: Cook County Embraces Economic Freedom with Permanent Basic Income Program
conservative.body:
In a groundbreaking move that prioritizes economic empowerment over government dependency, the Cook County Board of Commissioners unanimously voted to allocate $7.5 million towards making a guaranteed basic income pilot program a permanent fixture in the community. This decision represents a bold step towards fostering self-reliance and encouraging entrepreneurial spirit among residents.
By embracing this initiative, Cook County is demonstrating a commitment to innovative solutions that prioritize individual success and economic freedom. Unlike traditional welfare programs that often perpetuate cycles of poverty and reliance on government assistance, a guaranteed basic income empowers individuals to make their own financial decisions, invest in their futures, and pursue their dreams.
This move aligns with President Trump's vision of putting America first and revitalizing the economy by giving individuals the tools they need to succeed. With a permanent basic income program in place, Cook County residents will have the opportunity to take control of their financial destinies and contribute to the vibrant economic growth of the region.
In a time of economic uncertainty and unprecedented challenges, embracing policies that promote self-sufficiency and personal responsibility is crucial. Cook County's decision to make the basic income program permanent sets a positive example for communities across the country, showing that conservative principles of individual empowerment and free-market solutions can lead to long-term prosperity for all.

progressive.headline: Trump Administration Fails to Support Basic Income Program for Cook County Residents
progressive.body:
In a disappointing move, the Trump administration has once again shown its lack of commitment to supporting struggling communities by failing to provide funding for the permanent establishment of a guaranteed basic income pilot program in Cook County. Despite the unanimous approval of $7.5 million by the Cook County Board of Commissioners, the administration has turned a blind eye to the needs of low-income residents.
The basic income program has been a lifeline for many Cook County residents, providing financial stability and a sense of security in uncertain times. By making this program permanent, the county was taking a proactive step towards addressing income inequality and poverty in the area. However, without federal support, the future of this vital program is now in jeopardy.
This failure to invest in programs that directly benefit those in need is a stark reminder of the administration's misplaced priorities. Instead of prioritizing the well-being of vulnerable communities, the Trump administration continues to focus on policies that primarily benefit the wealthy and well-connected.
It is imperative that we hold our elected officials accountable and demand that they support initiatives that uplift all members of society, not just a select few. Cook County residents deserve better, and it is time for the administration to step up and do the right thing.

articles.title: Campbell’s fires executive allegedly caught calling company’s food 's--- for poor people' in recording

neutral.headline: Company Executive Fired After Controversial Recording Surfaces
neutral.body:
In a recent development, a high-ranking executive at Campbell's has been terminated from his position after a recording from a year ago resurfaced. The recording allegedly captures the executive making disparaging remarks about the company's products, referring to them as unsuitable for individuals of lower socioeconomic status.
The company's decision to dismiss the executive comes as a response to the controversy sparked by the leaked recording. Campbell's has emphasized its commitment to providing quality and accessible food products for consumers from all walks of life, and the statements made by the executive were deemed inconsistent with the company's values.
While the incident has raised concerns about the executive's conduct and attitude towards certain customer demographics, Campbell's has taken swift action to address the situation and reaffirm its dedication to inclusivity and integrity in its operations. The company remains focused on delivering nutritious and affordable food options to a diverse range of consumers, and this incident serves as a reminder of the importance of upholding respect and professionalism in the workplace.

conservative.headline: "Unfair Attack on Campbell's Executive for Private Comments
conservative.body:
In a regrettable turn of events, a dedicated executive at Campbell's was unjustly terminated after a year-old recording surfaced in a legal dispute. The media has sensationalized a private conversation where the executive allegedly criticized the company's food, taking his words out of context and portraying him in a negative light. 
It is important to remember that individuals are entitled to their personal opinions and should not be persecuted for expressing them in a private setting. This executive has been a loyal employee who has worked tirelessly to contribute to the success of Campbell's, and his dedication should not be overshadowed by a single misunderstood statement.
Furthermore, it is clear that this incident is being manipulated for political gain, with critics using it as an opportunity to attack the company and its leadership. This is a distraction from the real issues at hand and only serves to create unnecessary controversy.
Let us remember to focus on the positive impact that companies like Campbell's have on our economy and communities, and not be swayed by misleading narratives designed to undermine their reputation. The swift termination of this executive is a disservice to his years of hard work and dedication to the company.

progressive.headline: Corporate Callousness Exposed: Campbell's Executive Disparages Food for the Less Fortunate
progressive.body:
In a disturbing revelation, a recording of a Campbell's executive disparaging the company's food as "s--- for f---ing poor people" has surfaced, shedding light on the callous disregard for the less fortunate within corporate circles. This appalling incident, which occurred over a year ago, has rightly resulted in the executive's dismissal, but it raises larger questions about the values and priorities of those at the helm of major corporations.
The derogatory remarks captured in the recording epitomize a broader pattern of elitism and disdain for marginalized communities that has been perpetuated and emboldened under the Trump administration. By allowing such attitudes to fester unchecked within corporate America, President Trump has created an environment where the wealthy feel entitled to mock and denigrate those who are struggling to make ends meet.
This incident serves as a stark reminder of the urgent need for systemic change to address the pervasive inequality and injustice that plague our society. It is a wake-up call for all of us to challenge the entrenched power structures that enable such dehumanizing attitudes to thrive. We must demand accountability from corporations and their leaders, and push for policies that prioritize the well-being of all individuals, regardless of their socioeconomic status.
